# javaEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether Java is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var javaEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Deprecated

- **javaScriptEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether JavaScript is enabled.
- **plugInsEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether plug-ins are enabled.
